栱字的基本解释

栱
gǒng
〔枓栱〕见“
枓”。

栱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǒng］
［《廣韻》居悚切，上腫，見。］
在立柱与横梁交接处向外伸出成弓形的承重结构。

栱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栱； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第20
【唐韻】【正韻】居竦切【集韻】【韻會】古勇切，?音拱。大杙也。【爾雅·釋宮】杙大者謂之栱，長者謂之閣。　又栱斗，柱頭枓栱也。　又【集韻】渠容切，音蛩。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋宮】杙大者爲栱，小者爲閤。〕　謹照原文改杙大者謂之栱，長者謂之閣。
栱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栱字的起名意思

柱上支持大梁的方木。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǒng］
["Guangyun" is horrified and swollen on the top, see you. ]
A load-bearing structure that protrudes out into an arch shape at the junction of the vertical column and the beam.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栱; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 523 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ju Yu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gu Yong cut,? Sound arch. Oh, too. 【Erya·Shigong】The elders are called the pavilion, and the elders are called the pavilion.　Right again, stigma too.　[Jiyun] Qu Rongqie, sound cricket. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Shigong] The big one is the 栱, the small one is the union. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the original text for the elders to be called the 栱, and the elders to be the pavilion.
